summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Miracalis - Best Face Cream Moisturizer With Advanced Anti Aging Wrinkle Formula. Clinically Proven To Reduce Wrinkle Depth, Smooth Fine Lines & Soften Skin. Cruelty Free, Hypoallergenic
Review Date: 2014/09/23
Store: Miracalis
Product Description: ['* Face Moisturizer * Face Anti Aging * Deep Hydration Face Cream * Hydrating Anti Aging Moisturizer * Aging Cream * Hydration Cream For Face * Regenerating Day Cream * Face Moisturizing Cream * Facial Moisturizers Anti Aging * Anti Aging Facial Cream * Hydrating Moisturizer for Face * Deep Moisturizing Face Cream * Face Moisturizer Anti Aging * Moisturizing Cream Anti Aging * Peptide Face Cream * Moisturizer Facial Cream * Deep Face Moisturizer * Hydrating Facial Moisturizer * Best Face Moisturizer Anti Aging * Anti Aging Skin Care * Bare Mineral * Neck Moisturizer * Neck Cream * Skin Cream * Anti Aging Skin', 'Your Face Will Look Lovelier In Only 15 Days!', 'Reduces the depth of your facial wrinkles with daily use.', 'You will quickly look noticeably younger, healthier, and more attractive.', 'Simply apply Miracalis Anti-Aging Moisturizer Cream right after washing your face in the morning and again at night.', 'What About My Skin Type?', 'A safe, gentle, hypoallergenic formula that is tested and recommended for all 4 major skin types: Normal, Sensitive, Dry or Oily Skin', 'Your Shield Against The Signs Of Aging', "Your skin is under daily attack - air pollution, the sun's harmful rays, germs and time itself all wear down your skin's natural barriers. The result is dry, cracked and tired looking skin.", 'Our formula restores the two natural antioxidants (Vitamin E and Co-Enzyme Q10) that your skin needs to properly repair and maintain this barrier.', 'Your skin will look younger, be less sensitive. You will have healthier, attractive and glowing skin again.', '100% Satisfaction Guaranteed, Made in the USA']
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.63 x 2.63 x 2.05 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MIR-AAM001', 'UPC': '820103882309 794168056596', 'Manufacturer': 'Miracalis'}
Review Text: I got this moisturizer about 3-4 weeks ago and love it. It is nice and thick and I only need a dab on each cheek and a little on my forehead to cover my entire face. It makes my skin feel so soft and has done an awesome job at keeping it moisturized. I have tried a lot of brands of these creams and this one is right up there with all the top notch name brands that every one knows. I would buy this one again if I ever run out of my large stock of creams I now have. It is very nice and doesn't irritate my skin at all.
Review Title: Very nice!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Pink Hair Brush
Review Date: 2014/09/30
Store: THZY
Product Description: ['FLAT IRON']
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 2.9 x 1.7 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'VZ-DETBR-PK', 'UPC': '609595109299', 'Manufacturer': 'THZY'}
Review Text: So happy I bought this hairbrush. Normally when I brush my hair it comes out a lot and hurts while I brush as it rips out of my head. Wet hair is the worst for me but this brush went through almost like butter. There was no painfull pulling of my hair like before and it took less time for me to brush because I had an easier time getting through my tangled hair. My hair is a little longer than shoulder length. The design of this brush also makes it feel great in the palm of your hand.
Review Title: Very happy with this brush
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Organic Face Cream - Hydrates Nourishes and Protects Your Complexion Bare Naked Skin Restores Radiance - Natural Face Cream - With Shea Butter Virgin Coconut Oil Vitamin E Rosemary Extract - Anti-Aging Face Cream for Dry Damage Sensitive Skin Winter Protection
Review Date: 2014/12/05
Store: Bare Naked Skin
Product Description: ["'Youth in a Jar'", 'Give Your Skin A Treat!', '- 90% Natural 10% Organic  - Fragrance Free  - Toxin Free', 'All natural formulas harness the proven restorative and healing powers of African Shea Butter, Evening Primrose oil, key essential oils and an abundance of healing vitamins, photo-nutrients and anti-oxidants to both slow and minimise the effects of ageing as well as repair and renew damaged skin. Regular use will result to help you maintain noticeably a softer, smoother, healthier more youthful complexion. Ideal for both young and mature skin types.', 'Helps restore a more youthful look, texture and vibrancy to your complexion and eye area by diminishing wrinkle lines, instantly softening skin texture and providing anti-oxidant protection against daily pollution.', 'Nourishment For Your Skin', "With Shea butter, jojoba oil and virgin coconut oil, our organic face cream supplies ample moisture for the complexion. Rosemary balances and tones, while vitamin E and grape seed oil provide antioxidant protection. Together, the natural ingredients allow our natural face moisturiser to offer what your skin needs. At Bare Naked Skin, our number one priority is giving you products that you can use to improve the health of your complexion so much, you'll feel confident to show it off bare naked without a touch of makeup. We want you to love using our products, so if you're dissatisfied with our organic face moisturiser, we'll make things right! Every 30mL jar that we sell is backed by our 100% satisfaction guarantee. Don't over complicate your skin care routine with synthetic products that just don't work and are downright dangerous. Choose the gentle, natural moisturizer that is shown to get results!", '- Age Prevention  - Anti-Wrinkle  - Anti-Oxidant Protection  - Damage Repair  - Effective Moisturiser']
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Bare Naked Skin', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Mature,all skin types', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.5 x 3 x 2.5 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SBE0086', 'UPC': '820103108386', 'Manufacturer': 'mingkai'}
Review Text: I was lucky enough to exchange my honest opinion in order to receive this product. My thoughts are unbiased and completely honest. I like the organic factor although I think it might be a tad too natural for me. The product itself is a cream like you would think and be used to. The cream has very small chunks in it that for me at least don't really dissolve on my skin even when wet. I have to wipe off the excess after using this. I do love the packaging though. It's very unique in many ways. It does soften my skin very well and the oil in it doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy at all. That part I like very much. I do wish the actual product was smoother though. Other than that I do like it though.
Review Title: A unique face cream.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Exfoliating Loofah Sponges - Men and Women - Shower and Bath (3 Scrubber Sponge Belts)
Review Date: 2015/03/09
Store: Beverly Hills Beauty Supply
Product Description: ['Size: 34" ( including handle) x 3.25 (width) All Natural, Hypoallergenic and Luxurious Terry Cotton - Cleans 40% better than with Soap Alone Made from natural grown loofah gourds, our Loofah Sponges provide a gentle daily exfoliating experience. Our economical multi-packs allow you to stock up and replace them when the time comes. Remember to soak your loofah sponge in water before using it for the first time. Tips for maintaining your Loofah Sponge: Like any other sponge, loofahs are meant to be used for a limited time before being replaced. However, if you follow these tips on cleaning your loofah, you will be able to a month of use out of a single loofah. Dry it daily: After using your loofah, remove it from the moist shower environment and leave it somewhere with enough airflow to completely dry it out between uses. If you want to be extra cautious, soap up the loofah and rinse it out on its own after washing yourself and before letting it hang to dry. Clean it: Your loofah should be cleaned once a week. Every few weeks, soak the loofah in a solution of 5 percent bleach and then rinse thoroughly. Avoid use after shaving: Bacteria can enter your skin through any sort of nick or cut, so you shouldn’t use your loofah on the affected area for a couple of days after shaving. Replace it regularly: Natural loofahs should be replaced every month. If you notice mold on it or it develops a mildewy or musty odor, replace it immediately.']
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13.2 x 5.9 x 3 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '784672199599', 'Manufacturer': 'Beverly Hills Beauty Supply'}
Review Text: The back is the hardest spot to reach for everything from cleaning, to exfoliating, to moisturizing that I tend to slack on that area as much as I hate to admit it. The loofah back and body scrubber sponge has changed all that for me from the second I used it. They are so easy to use and comfortable to hold. The belt-like portion is long enough where I can hold both handles and not feel strained or awkward but relaxed as I loofah away. The handles are very soft and braided. The belt is about 28 inches long and 3 1/4 inches wide. The loofah makes up about 11 inches in the middle. It's soft and not paper thin but kind of squishy and padded if that makes sense. It's put together very well, feels and looks of high quality. I've used other loofahs in the past that were very hard and actually hurt to use. I've been pleasantly surprised by these in the fact that they truly do give a gentle exfoliation. They feel nice and never too rough or scratchy. I absolutely love that these don't hurt because I honestly used to be scared of most loofah products. I also love that there are three of them in this pack. Not that I want to share cause I like them a lot although you could share with a spouse if need be. I suggest keeping them all to your self though because, well, they are very nice quality. I did receive a promotional product although my thoughts and opinions are always completely my own and unbiased.
Review Title: Gentle yet exfoliates nicely.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual demonstrates a strong preference for skincare and personal grooming products, with a notable emphasis on moisturizing and anti-aging benefits. High ratings are consistently given (4 to 5 stars) to products that promise hydration, gentleness, and effective results, indicating a favorable sentiment towards quality ingredients and performance. 

Across the purchases, themes of hydration and natural ingredients emerge prominently, with an inclination towards cruelty-free and hypoallergenic options. The user seems to be particularly concerned about skin health, favoring products that feature natural, restorative components and are easy to apply.

Quality is a significant factor, as highlighted by positive experiences with comforting textures and minimal irritation, while a willingness to pay for effective products is noted but balanced by some evidence of price sensitivity, demonstrating caution with budget considerations on less familiar brands.

In conclusion, the core preferences reveal the user values effective, high-quality skincare products that prioritize moisturizing and anti-aging benefits, prefer natural and hypoallergenic formulas, and maintain a balance between quality and cost. The recurring positive experiences with ease of use in personal care tools further underscore their desire for convenience and efficiency in their grooming routine.

target_interaction.title: Shrinks my pores and smells wonderful.
target_interaction.text: The first thing I noticed about this product was the scent. One of the ingredients is orange blossom water so it has a very light, clean, floral type scent. The scent isn't strong but light and refreshing. I absolutely love the smell. The spray pump makes it easy to apply and the size is perfect to throw in my purse in case I need a little refreshing throughout the day. I don't have huge pores although in certain spots they are more noticeable like on the sides of my nose and upper cheek areas. I find this spray does a good job at making those pores look smaller and my skin look overall smoother. I was afraid this would make my skin appear shiny but it doesn't do that. It also isn't sticky at all. I have used it both under my makeup and over it. Both ways work just the same and just as well. The formula doesn't irritate my skin at all which is a huge plus. You do need to reapply this throughout the day but it does last for quite a few hours. I only applied it twice, once in the morning and once in the later afternoon to refresh it. Overall I really like this product. It smells great, is easy to use, and helps the texture/look of my skin. I did get this product with a discount/ promotion although my thoughts and opinions are always my own and unbiased.

Knock 10 Years Off--Instantly! Evens Complexion MISTIQ Accentuates Your Natural Beauty. It Corrects Skin Tone and Even Alleviates Rosacea, Redness and Blotches. Give Your Skin a Vibrant Glow! Versatile Simply Spray MISTIQ on Your Face, and it will Improve Your Look--Over or Under Makeup. It Makes the Perfect Pick-Me-Up for When You Don't Have Time to Freshen Your Look. Look Your Best at Any Moment--From the Office to Special Occasions! MISTIQ is an Innovative Formula that Helps Your Skin to Look Its Best - Lasts About 4 Hours - 97% Natural Ingredients - No Parabens, Sulfates or Phthalates - Made for All Skin Types - Made in USA - No Animal Testing The Protege Promise: Your SATISFACTION GUARANTEED If You are Not Satisfied with MISTIQ, Contact Protege within 365 Days of Your Purchase, and They will Issue a Complete Refund.
